attribute.name: active
attribute.query: cast(case when !@status='ACTIVE' then 1 when !@status='INACTIVE' or !@status is null then 0 end as int)

attribute.name: attachmentcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from doclinks where ownertable = 'SR' and ownerid = !@ticketuid)

attribute.name: communicationcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from commlog where ownertable = 'SR' and ownerid = !@ticketuid)

attribute.name: relatedcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from relatedrecord where class = 'SR' and recordkey = !@ticketid)

attribute.name: workordercounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from workorder where status not in ('CAN', 'CLOSE', 'COMP') and assetnum = !@assetnum and siteid = !@siteid)

attribute.name: attachmentcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from doclinks where ownertable = 'WORKORDER' and ownerid = !@workorderid)

attribute.name: communicationcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from commlog where ownertable = 'WORKORDER' and ownerid = !@workorderid)

attribute.name: relatedcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from relatedrecord where class = 'WORKORDER' and recordkey = !@wonum)

attribute.name: attachmentcounter
attribute.query: (select count(*) from doclinks where ownertable = 'INCIDENT' and ownerid = !@ticketuid)

entity.name: invissue
entity.whereclause: (ISSUETYPE = 'ISSUE' or ISSUETYPE = 'RETURN') and INVISSUE.ITEMNUM is not NULL
